database.name: VIEW EFIN_SECURITYDEPTPICK_V
database.view: SELECT (((org.value || '-') || val.value) || '-') || val.name AS name, val.c_salesregion_id AS efin_securitydeptpick_v_id, val.created, val.createdby, val.updated, val.updatedby, val.ad_client_id, val.ad_org_id, val.isactive, val.value FROM c_salesregion val JOIN ad_org org ON org.ad_org_id = val.ad_org_id ORDER BY org.value, val.value
